official_title: To prohibit the use of the social cost of carbon in any regulatory impact analysis until a Federal law is enacted authorizing such use.
short_title: Taking Hold of Regulations to Increase Vital Employment In Energy Act

summary.text: Taking Hold of Regulations to Increase Vital Employment In Energy Act - Prohibits a federal agency from using the social cost of carbon to incorporate any social benefits of reducing carbon dioxide emissions in any regulatory impact analysis unless and until a federal law is enacted authorizing such use.
